body:
So I finally achieved my goal of getting a 3.0K/D.
So...in celebration I'm gonna have my 3.0rd AMA!

Shoot!!

title: Snow's 3rd AMA.

replies.body: What is your favourite aspect of Avicus?
replies.body_tagged: What is your favourite aspect of Avicus?

replies.body: What is the purpose of all the AMA's? You did your last one two weeks ago.
replies.body_tagged: What is the purpose of all the AMA's? You did your last one two weeks ago.

replies.body:
@pelpelajax 
Definitely the community. There are so many friendly people on here, it's amazing.

@S3M3L
hmm I guess there has been too little of a gap.
Thanks for telling me, I'll hold off from now on :)

replies.body:
@DaBaderMC
Although I have been aiming for a 3.0K/D
-I don't mind what my K/D is. It's all about the good times for me.
-Nebula hands down.
-What do you mean? I'm pretty active on Avicus..

@Tarheelkiwi
- My skin is purly random 
-My name is a mixture of my favourite games: SSX3 and Midtown Madness 3.
-PC
-Bajan.
- Well...considering I am a Kiwi (New Zealander)
I'm obviously going to say Kiwis!

@iBiZa_MiNeCrAfT
-New Zealand.
-XXX XXXX
-I'm free most of the time.
-No.
-Probabaly not.
